review_text: An excellent ride with almost all trendy and desired features within the same variant without extra charges. Highly recommended for German SuV lovers who need not only exciting ride but also comfort , efficiency and amazing road grip . The very special feature about Q2 is that it’s extremely spacious and comfortable despite of its compact size.
